name: Crazy Traffic Light DEMO
description:
Welcome to the crazy traffic light, you cross roads with the cool Policeman, but most importantly, NEVER TAKE THE RED LIGHT, or you will die, there will also be traps, a timer, a stamina, evil and kind characters. Well, good luck in games. .. ##### Ofwfs qmbz uijt hbnf boe zpv xjmm hfu joup ju !!! #########

Do not forget, this is a demo, if you want more, then please wait for the full version and that's it

Have a nice game!!!
